flavorText: Urak froze when he heard it. That was his first mistake. He turned and cast a dramatic ward spell. That was his last.

foreignData.flavorText: その音を聞いて、ウラクは凍りついた。それが彼の最初の過ちだった。彼は振り返り、強烈な結界呪文を唱えた。それが彼の最期の過ちだった。
foreignData.name: 魔力軟体
foreignData.text: あなたが呪文を１つ唱えるたび、ターン終了時まで、魔力軟体は＋Ｘ/＋Ｘの修整を受ける。Ｘはその呪文の点数で見たマナ・コストに等しい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ウーズ

foreignData.flavorText: 这声音让乌拉克僵住；这是他犯的第一个错误。他转身施放强大防护咒语； 这是他犯的最后一个错误。
foreignData.name: 魔力流浆
foreignData.text: 每当你施放咒语时，魔力流浆得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为该咒语的总法术力费用。

name: Manaplasm
originalText: Whenever you cast a spell, Manaplasm gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

rulings.text: Converted mana cost takes into account only the mana symbols printed in the upper right corner of the card. Manaplasm doesn’t care about additional costs, alternative costs, cost-reduction effects, or what you actually paid to cast the spell.

While a spell with {X} in its cost is on the stack, its converted mana cost takes the chosen value of X into account. For example, if you cast Blaze (a spell with the mana cost {X}{R}) and choose a value of 5 for that X, then your Manaplasm will get +6/+6 until end of turn.

text: Whenever you cast a spell, Manaplasm gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that spell's mana value.
